text: I am trying to check in hubl if a richtext field stored in hubdb is empty but not having any luck .. tried `{% if dynamic_page_hubdb_row.lead_text != "<p></p>" %}` and `{% if dynamic_page_hubdb_row.lead_text != "" %}`
ok `{% if dynamic_page_hubdb_row.lead_text is string %}` seems to do the trick
Does anybody know if the "private - registration required" setup works in a sandbox account? I'm not seeing the registration email or the forgot password email.
Im actually trying to work on something similar and im pretty sure it wont send because sandbox environments do not have access to emails
If you try to resend the registration link manually it errors out.
registration emails are sent only if the page is on a connected domain (they won't work on hs-test domains)
